entry.question: Does Ransack’s first Alt ability count himself?
entry.answer: No, he says *other* Insecticon on your starting team. If your team was 4 Insecticons, including him, your deck could have up to 3 extra stars in it.

entry.question: Is Ransack’s flip-to-Alt ability optional; do I have to do it if I have an Upgrade I could scrap?
entry.answer: The ability is mandatory, if you have an Upgrade--so be careful about flipping this guy!

entry.question: Does Raider Brunt or Acid Storm stop Ransack’s Bot mode flipping of extra cards in battle?
entry.answer: No, those characters care about Bold; this mechanic is similar to Bold, but is not the named mechanic unless keyworded as such.
